segments.text: What did the woman ask you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , she asked me all sorts of questions . She asked if I smoked , and whether I played sports , she asked me where I went to school , and what subjects I took , and she asked me if I like to meeting people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did she ask you any questions about your family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , she asked me if my parents wanted me to be a steward .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did she tell you whether you would get the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but she told me to telephone her next week .
segments.speaker: S2
